statements: DELETE FROM quality_control_data_3d_printed_parts WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM quality_control_data_3d_printed_parts WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe' AND dimensions_3d_printed > 100.00;
DELETE FROM Parts WHERE part_id = 100 AND production_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Parts WHERE printer_model = 'XYZ-100' OR material = 'Steel';
DELETE FROM InspectionNotes WHERE notes IS NULL;
DELETE FROM PartImages WHERE part_id = 100 AND image_description IS NULL
DELETE FROM PartImages WHERE part_name = 'Engine Block';
DELETE FROM PartQualityControl WHERE inspector_name = 'Alice' AND inspection_result = false;
